name: SmartMote(SmartHomeoptimized)
0:
”Alexa, turn on the TV.”
”Alexa, go to channel 5 on living room TV.”
”Alexa, turn up the volume on living room TV.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill allows you to talk to SmartMote universal remote (http://smartmote.me) to control your infrared devices. First, link both this skill and your SmartMote with your Amazon account. Setup your SmartMote to learn the infrared code for the devices you want to control. You can then use this skill to voice control your infrared devices
